item.title: A Segue from Segways
item.description: This content was created as part of an educational workshop for SASE Labs UMN, of which I served as director from 2020-2021. Check out the demo here. Introduction Polizei make Segways go brrr Segways are pretty cool, and they can be the perfect segue into talking about control theory. Segways need a robust mechanism for correcting itself in order to self-balance.
